name: Slightly Smiling Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with a slight, closed smile.
tldr: Deceptively passive-aggressive. Can mean 'fine' or hide frustration/sarcasm.

contextMeanings.meaning: Hiding frustration or annoyance behind a thin smile.
Masking true feelings with fake pleasantness.

generationalNotes.note: Almost always passive-aggressive - the fake smile emoji.
May use genuinely as a friendly smile.

warnings.title: Passive-aggressive risk
warnings.description: Younger generations often read this as passive-aggressive or fake. Consider using more enthusiastic emojis.
